main.name: Sergi Prat
main.bio: I am a system administrator specialized in virtualization with the vSphere platform, Office 365, Veeam Backup, Active Directory and networking. I consider myself an orderly and perfectionist person, I am good at organizing work groups and taking responsibilities, I have initiative.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Development and implementation of security countermeasures, Python and Bash scripting, Offensive Pentesting, Dockerization...
Administer and maintain computer systems, guaranteeing the functionality, the integrity of the system's resources and services, with the required quality and complying with current regulations.
Install and maintain fixed and mobile network services, Internet services and computer systems and also provide support to users

work.title: System administrator
work.description: Manage and maintain the integrity, scalability and availability of the company's computer system both at a physical level and at a cloud level. This includes networking (Cisco, Mikrotik, Aruba, NetGEAR, Synology, QNAP...), virtualization (vSphere), backups (Veeam Backup), Exchange Online and Onedrive/Sharepoint (Office 365).
